mapper.select: SELECT a.htmSeq, a.htmUserName, a.htmGender, a.htmBirth, a.htmId, a.htmPassword, a.htmPhoneNumber, a.htmEmail, a.htmAddress, a.htmDetailedAddress, a.htmZipCode, a.htmRegDate, a.htmGrade, a.htmRegAgreeContentNy, a.htmEditMemberDate, a.htmDelNy FROM newjeans.hotelmember a ORDER BY a.htmSeq desc
